item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Pornogr@phyand its devastating consequences on the Youth & Women in the Nation of India Dr. Dominic F. Dixon (Psychologist) What is Pornography? The word pornography is composed of two Greek words. The first is porne, meaning “harlot,” which is akin to the word pernanai, meaning “to sell.” The second word is graphein, meaning “to write.”1 In other words, pornography is literally “the writing of harlots.” Webster’s New Collegiate Dictionary, G.
